appTitle: Celestia Submit Pay For Blob Transaction

backend.apiFailureMessage: Unable to submit, try again after some time

missingValuesMessage: Please fill in some data to be submitted

fields.label: Your Node IP
fields.hoverText: Enter the IP address of your data availability node.

fields.label: RPC Port
fields.hoverText: Enter the RPC port number of your data availability node.

fields.label: Auth Token
fields.hoverText: Enter the authentication token for your data availability node.

fields.label: Namespace ID
fields.hoverText: Enter the Namespace ID if you have one, or leave this blank to have a new Namespace ID generated for you.
